text: Afroscoparia contemptalis is a moth in the family Crambidae. It was described by Francis Walker in 1866. It is found in South Africa, where it is found in the south-western part of the Western Cape Province. The length of the forewings is 6.5-8.5 mm for males and 7.5–8 mm for females.Nuss, M. (2003). Afroscoparia – a new genus of Scopariine from southern Africa (Insecta: Lepidoptera: Pyraloidea: Crambidae). Entomologische Abhandlungen 61(1) 109-15. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1866 Category:Scopariinae
title: Afroscoparia contemptalis
